name: Burst Fighter
description: Burst Fighter is a shoot'em up game with unique customizable ship feature fused with modern graphic and gorgeous art styles. Dodge, counter, and defeat various enemies / attack patterns. Experience more than 8 challenging and intense boss battles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 6600 or better Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Intel Core i3 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GT 640 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
